text: Minatree Catron House, also known as Minatree Acres, is a historic home located near Lexington, Lafayette County, Missouri. It was built about 1843, and is a two-story, central passage plan, Greek Revival style brick I-house. It has a one-story rear ell. The front facade features a two-story pedimented portico supported by square brick columns. (includes 16 photographs from 1995) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1997. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Greek Revival houses in Missouri Category:Houses completed in 1843 Category:Houses in Lafayette County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Lafayette County, Missouri
title: Minatree Catron House
